page.title: 20BRYN-FUTURE PLANS
page.content: {AFAN BOROUGH COUNCIL LOCAL 10 YR.PLAN BRYN-REPAIR AND IMPROVE EXISTING HOUS -ING,(Â£250,000).LAND FOR DEVELOPMENT 1.6 HECTARES CROSS ROW/COALYARD ROW, 0.3 | | FARTEG ROW;0.9 HECTARES STATION TERR.;0.6HECTARES ROYAL OAK; (25 DWELLINGS PER. HECTARE) {INDUSTRY:}PROVIDE SMALL SITE FOR INDU STRIAL DEVELOPMENT,BOROUGH IS SPECIAL DEVELOPMENT AREA,WITH REGIONAL AID GRANTS FROM WELSH OFFICE.LAND-MEADOW ROW,LIGHT INDUSTRY WORKSHOPS,UP TO 100 sq.m. {TRANSPORT:}IMPROVE B.4282 AT ROYAL OAK IMPROVE FOOTPATH AT ROWLANDS COTTAGES, CHAPEL TERR.,BRYNGURNOS,NEATH ROAD. JUNCTION IMPROVEMENT ON B.4282. {RECREATION:}PICNIC SITE AT FORESTRY LO DGE,BRYN.PATH ON RAILWAY FROM PORT TALBOT TO BRYN,FROM CRAIG-Y-LLYN,FROM BRYN STATION TO AFAN ARGOED.CAR PARK AT BRYN STATION.COMMUNITY BLDG.NEEDED.
